about_the_game:
The Corkscrew: Betas Galore! DLC is an archive containing old builds, assets and "historic documentation" of Corkscrew's development from all the way back when I was a little kid making "games" in GDevelop and other smaller engines, you can play them at your own curiosity, but they are here more for preservation following my migration from Gamejolt to Steam and to be frank are in no truly playable state, so far the archive of The Corkscrew: Betas Galore! DLC includes:

  • Corkscrew Alpha Demo: the old demo I had created using scuffed assets, which is broken, but playable. 2018 approx

  • Corkscrew POC Demo (AKA the Meme Build Demo): newer but outdated demo before the assets were overhauled, playable but unbeatable. 2022 approx

  • Corkscrew Meme Run: to keep the Original Gamejolt page for Corkscrew (2019) going after I made a separate one for the "real" Corkscrew, I had basically split the game off into a infinite runner game to quickly replace the game, although the Gamejolt pages assets and other packages haven't been updated to match. 2022-2023 approx

  • Corkscrew 2019: The original scuffed game from 2019, I was originally going to leave Corkscrew be until I had finished Horizions (another game I am creating) and Corkscrew HD (a remake of Corkscrew 2019 I was planning to make post-Horizions) but my disliking of the scuffed assets caused me to put Horizions on hold to merge Corkscrew HD with Corkscrew 2019, creating the project that resulted in the current incarnation of the game, simply titled CORKSCREW.

I plan to add more at a later date, however I am putting all of the manpower into developing the game rather than building the archive, so stay tuned!

The Corkscrew: Betas Galore! DLC is an archive containing old builds, assets and "historic documentation" of Corkscrew's development from all the way back when I was a little kid making "games" in GDevelop and other smaller engines, you can play them at your own curiosity, but they are here more for preservation following my migration from Gamejolt to Steam and to be frank are in no truly playable state, so far the archive of The Corkscrew: Betas Galore! DLC includes:

  • Corkscrew Alpha Demo: the old demo I had created using scuffed assets, which is broken, but playable. 2018 approx

  • Corkscrew POC Demo (AKA the Meme Build Demo): newer but outdated demo before the assets were overhauled, playable but unbeatable. 2022 approx

  • Corkscrew Meme Run: to keep the Original Gamejolt page for Corkscrew (2019) going after I made a separate one for the "real" Corkscrew, I had basically split the game off into a infinite runner game to quickly replace the game, although the Gamejolt pages assets and other packages haven't been updated to match. 2022-2023 approx

  • Corkscrew 2019: The original scuffed game from 2019, I was originally going to leave Corkscrew be until I had finished Horizions (another game I am creating) and Corkscrew HD (a remake of Corkscrew 2019 I was planning to make post-Horizions) but my disliking of the scuffed assets caused me to put Horizions on hold to merge Corkscrew HD with Corkscrew 2019, creating the project that resulted in the current incarnation of the game, simply titled CORKSCREW.

I plan to add more at a later date, however I am putting all of the manpower into developing the game rather than building the archive, so stay tuned!

  • OS: 7
